title: Brown heath and blue bells :
author: Winter, William
snippet: At Ladybank the traveller is almost within the shadow of that singular mountain, the obvious inspiration  of the name, which, with its symmetrical  double peaks, suggests a virgin bosom bared to the benediction of the sky.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Ladybank, on the right of v.liich is Ramoinie House (Heriot, Esq.) Crawford Priory (Earl of Glasgow).

title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: I could havestayed on much longer chatting with the dear old dame,but feared to tire her, and drove back to Ladybank, andthence by rail to " Auld Reekie."
